Coworking

Draper Startup House Da Nang Membership and Pricing

Coworking is a great way to meet new people, stimulate your creativity, and learn from those around you. Members at Draper Startup House get so much more than just wifi and a desk, we also provide mentorship, networking and events curated specifically to support entrepreneurs and startups.

Day Pass

Give Us a Try

Enjoy full use of our space whether you want to hang out in the cafe, use our meeting rooms or chill out on the rooftop. Includes drinking water or self-serve coffee/tea. Access anytime starting from 7am til whenever you care to leave (no re-entry permitted after 6pm).

฿100

Flex Pass

Come and Go as You Like

Access our coworking space, enjoy a complimentary espresso coffee drink plus 10% off anything else in the cafe. Flex Passes offer great value and savings without locking you in to a fixed time frame to user up your membership. Buy a package of 5 or 10 days, use within 90 days of purchase. Daytime use only

Starting at ฿500

Membership

Your All-Access Pass

Get all the perks of the other passes and a keycard to access our space 24/7. Monthly members also get FREE access to all our events and discounts on visa and business services.

Starting at ฿2400

Please note our cafe is always open to the public - no membership required! Just order food or drinks from our menu.
Open Monday to Saturday from 7am to 6pm.

More Than Just a Place To Work

We're committed to the success of our community and the health of the local startup ecosystem. That's why we put such a big emphasis on mentorship, events, and services. We know entrepreneurship and we know Da Nang, so we curate and connect you to what you need to succeed and grow.

Da Nang's Most Dynamic Coworking Community
